TopicTitle: KSP Crashes to desktop before loading title screen

Articles.Content:
My game was working fine but now it crashes every time before loading.

My install is heavily modded, but I've been playing for several days with no problems.

If someone could take a look at this error.log & let me know if they see anything wonky I'd really appreciate it.

Thanks in advance.

~Eric

[Error.log] removed to preserve the sanity of my mobile friends.

Problem SOLVED. Along w/ corrupted display settings, the small stock one man lander can "model.mu" file seems to have been damaged.

I reinstalled KSP to an new directory, copied the "model.mu" from thew new directly to the old directory & restarted my computer, all issues went away & the game worked normally.

Thanks to ExplorerKlatt for your response & etiquette tips.

~Eric

- - - Updated - - -

I was able to get KSP to load by tweaking the the graphics settings via the launcher (lowering terrain detail, turning off anti-aliasing, etc).

- - - Updated - - -

I tried editing the graphics settings via the launcher, which got the game to load. However, I'm getting all kinds of weird random crashes.

Ships that I've flown several missions with won't load.

The stage stack disappears occasionally, so I reverted launch, spacebar wouldn't launch.

When I went EVA on the launchpad the screen went black (but mechjeb, the stock altimeter & the staging stack were still visible).

Weird....

- - - Updated - - -

Update: the revert button is grayed out now & is totally unusable.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-10T02:36:38Z" title="04/10/2015 02:36  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 10, 2015</time> by braedan51**
  
Problem Solved

First, the error.log doesn't help much. Get the output\_log.txt. 

Second, use a site like Dropbox or Pastebin to upload the logs the post a link here. The wall of text from posting a log directly into the forums is gonna deter a lot of people. It is especially harsh for those using mobile devices to view the forums.
